sources.title: Blood Fingers - Brutal Boxer (Martial Arts Spielfilm in voller Länge, deutsch) *ganze Filme youtube*

BLOOD FINGERS - BRUTAL BOXER 
Martial-Arts von Shan Kwan aus dem Jahr 1972.
Mit: Sing Chen, Raymond Lui
Regie: Shan Kwan
FSK: Freigegeben ab 16 Jahren

INHALTSANGABE:
Der junge Jackie arbeitet für den skrupellosen Verbrecherboss King Chan. Als ein Widersacher des Syndikates brutal niedergemetzelt wird, beginnt eine gnadenlose Schlacht auf Leben und Tod. Die kompromißlose Anwendung authentischer Kampftechniken begründet den Ruf dieses Films, einer der blutigsten des Genre zu sein.

metadata.Plot: Two brothers, Hsaio and Wu Cheng, are searching for their uncle in the restaurant that they mistakenly think he owns. Finding out too late that he doesn't and unable to pay their bill, they are besieged by the thugs that run it. When the twosome are able to fight the gang off, their skills are recognized by the crooked owner, King Chan, who hires them and offers to assist in finding the missing relative. The uncompromising application of authentic fighting techniques established this film's reputation for being one of the bloodiest in the genre.
metadata.Actors: Sing Chen, Raymond Lui, Ni Tien
